Monster Musume No Iru Nichijou started from a bunch of short comics, and is basically exactly the same as those comics, just without monogamy and penetrative m/f sex.  To be fair, the originals were contained in a single page each.  Nekopara started as entirely sexual doujins, and has since been made into eroges, a couple 'family' (wut?) VNs, and a SFW anime OVA.  I'm gonna go out on a limb and say there's probably quite a few more manga/anime series which started as porn and got bleached, since I don't follow non-porn Jap works, and a lot of Jap mangakas got their start making doujins anyway.  Surely there's more who liked their doujin works enough to bleach them later.
Oh fuck, I took them a while to post this, and I'm a week late! Anyways I'm  glad it got translated!

I mean usually hentai is a parody of a manga or anime but in this one the manga is the parody of the hentai. Think about how unique that is. If you don't, please give me another example of a hentai manga being the predecessor to its manga counterpart made by the same artist. Honestly interested. By the way hellsing author also made hentai manga and rape priest is one of the recycled characters. Good luck.

I mean, Imagine being 1214 and having sex with your Big Sister In a newly Air Conditioned room...Imagine how It must feel, the cool breeze on your naked body as your blood related (or foster sister gently strokes your teenage cock with her mouth and then she goes faster and faster and when you are moaning that your going to cum she deepthroats you...all while calling you cute and handsome, and teasing you...Truly does hentai allows you to live your fantasies I'd say. gives all of us solace to know there are others who might be like us via reading works like these. I am sorry I got sidetracked though, anyway, on to the rating, overall I give this work a 10/10 (and since this rating Is not enough an 11/10) just a great work which everyone and anyone who enjoys some fine wine (hentai) should read and add to their collection, If not you are not a true Shota Connoisseur.

I have been waiting for a translation of this since Its release, every day I logged on to nhentai to see If this beauty was translated, today I did the same and lo and behold It Is here...the God Of Shota himself has descended down on and blessed us with another great work of his. I have to say, this Is the best In the series, rivaling the chapter where there were 2 Onee-sans. The art style Is just mesmerizing, I always have admired how detailed and sophisticated Pochi's art style has always been, and this one just takes the cake since In some panels I saw how he used darker shades and lighter shades to give the impression of morning and night which not many authors are able to pull off since It Is a hard trick. I also loved the variety of sex scenes and the blowjob scene as well, I shall actually be nutting to It soon after writing this. The story of how Its summer time so they Installed an AC and are fucking In that same room just Is great...having sex with sis In the AC...so good...
